resources.string: Press on color below to apply
View or change power menu entries
Double-tap on the top third or bottom shortcut area of the lock screen to put the device to sleep
Double-tap status bar to put the device to sleep
Slide three fingers down to take a screenshot
Double tap power button (slower single tap response), Disables double power tap for camera.
Jump to camera gesture is now disabled
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Long press volume buttons to switch tracks while the screen is off
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Disable power menu on lock screen
This will only disable the power menu on secure lock screens
Display the app\'s icon corresponding with the toast
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Time out feature may require a SystemUI restart.
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Pulldown status bar from right side
Pulldown status bar from left side
Always show quick settings on status bar pull down
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Enable the running services icon in the footer
Enable the tile edit icon in the footer
Display the cross sign next to signal bar when data is disabled
Display roaming indicator when in roaming mode
Button backlight brightness will adjust based on current screen brightness level
Button backlight will only appear when buttons are pressed rather than on all the time. Timeout still impacts this feature.
Show visualizer bars while playing music
Sync color with lock screen background
Use a smooth lava lamp style color blend animation
Display a warning at bottom of QS panel when network is monitored by external apps or vpn
Open quick settings when there are %1$s notifications
Open quick settings when there are no notifications
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Enable or disable battery light while on DND, low battery
Battery light in Do Not Disturb mode
Use old style mobile data icons
Show mobile type icon on top of the signal indicator
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Show estimated remaining battery life next to the icon
Turn the screen on when connecting or disconnecting a power source
Choose the default behavior when connected to a device via USB
Use custom color for monet engine instead of wallpaper colors
Require unlocking to use sensitive tiles
Ask to unlock lockscreen when using sensitive tiles
Show heads up only for dialer, messaging and alarm app
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s long press menu
Customize the layout of the navigation bar
Display left and right cursor buttons in navigation bar while typing

[1]These settings mainly relate to the 3-button navigation bar. If you use gesture navigation and want to customize it, e.g. hide the gesture handle, please visit: Settings > Ancient Features > Gestures > AOSP Gestures. [2]Navbar Icon Style Requires SystemUI restart for take effect
Enter a custom label. Leave blank to use your network name
Double-tap to wake when device is dreaming
Perform various touchscreen gestures for quick actions
Display an animation when the device is plugged in
Options to extend your battery life
Let everyone know that you\'re using Ancient when they see your screen
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Show a brightness slider on bottom quick settings
Show brightness slider in Quick QS Panel
Show a brightness slider in the quick qs panel
Show headers in the notification shade
use custom icon for charging state
for Miui V2 and Dappa only
Replace clear all notification text with floating button
move volume panel to left side
Choose the style of your statusbar icons (requires SystemUI restart)
Choose the style of your notification headers icons (requires SystemUI restart)
Play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Shows an animation while reading your finger
Disable night light when showing FOD
Disable night light on lockscreen if FOD is active. Disabling this option might affect your fingerprint accuracy with night light on.
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app.
switch this off to back to stock aosp look
Display the number of pending notifications
Choose your favorite FOD pressed color
Enable custom FOD Icon from files
Select custom image from your saved files or gallery
Customize gestures and set custom actions
Show charging current, voltage, wattage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Light ambient edges for pulsing notifications
Keep showing edge lightning on AOD
Hide AOD content when edges are lighted
Time it takes for each animation to complete
Amount of times the animation should show\n0 for infinite
Show lights for all doze events and not just notifications
When entirely silent (no ringer or vibrator)
Whether to flash when in Do Not Disturb mode
Turns on from sunset till a time
Turns on from a time till sunrise
Show music ticker on Ambient Display during track change
This working only for device have Refresh Rate, requires SystemUI restart
Change maximum icon notification on StatusBar, requires SystemUI restart
Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer when music plays on the device
Audio graphic equalizer for navigation bar and lock screen
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Audio graphic equalizer on the lock screen
Audio graphic equalizer on the ambient screen
Each bar is animated more smoothly
Audio visualizer on the quick settings
Set the visualizer in center mirrored mode
Create other pulse and flip vertically
Don\'t switch to the big clock when there are no notifications
Hide QS in secure lock screen
Hides QS if device is locked. Does not disable notification shade
Show separate indicator when an any app uses mic or camera
Show separate indicator when an any app uses location
Extra features for immersive gaming experience
Display battery status for the connected bluetooth device, if available
Shows current network traffic speed in statusbar. The monitor shows the speed dynamically such that it alternates between upload and download speed each second
Network traffic rate text scale factor
Show ripple effect on unlock with fingerprint
Drag selection on the area you want to take as a screenshot
